channel.title: Alison Brie on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Together’ Filmmaker Michael Shanks Breaks Down the Necessity of His Film’s Memorable Sex Scene
item.description: “It’s certainly not a scene for titillation. It’s a scene of tension and cringe," says the filmmaker of the moment between real-life married couple Alison Brie and Dave Franco.

item.title: Alison Brie and Dave Franco Tease ‘Together’ Proposal Contest: “How Crazy Romantic is This?”
item.description: Neon is picking up the tab for an all expenses paid Las Vegas wedding for one lucky couple that gets engaged at a movie theater (inside or out) between now and Aug. 4.
